title: Wont let me submit support ticket
body: Am logged in to the website, and trying to submit a ban appeal ticket, however, I click the request type, then it says I need to login to submit this type of ticket but I am logged in, in the top right?

replies.body:
Hey man,

Could you try loading up the support page in an incognito/inPrivate browser window/tab.

Let me know if this helps.
